description: The star says he understands why his fellow actor/producer shouted at a film crew over Covid safety.
title: George Clooney: 'Tom Cruise didn't overreact'
title_page: George Clooney: 'Tom Cruise didn't overreact' - BBC News
maintext: "And, you know, if the production goes down, a lot of people lose their jobs. People have to understand that and have to be responsible. It's just not my style to, you know, to take everybody to task that way."
